duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the ICU department with immediate and lasting improvements.
Foster collaboration and guide team efforts to achieve set goals.
Analyze customer behavior and refine strategies for the ICU department.
Manage online presence and optimize for maximum engagement.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events and conferences.
Measure and report on the performance of ICU department strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
